alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blowing Dust Advisory issued April 10 at 12:00PM MST until April 10 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...BLOWING DUST ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Visibility between one quarter mile and one mile in blowing dust expected. * WHERE...Eastern Cochise County below 5000 feet and Upper Gila River Valley. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust will produce low visibilities today, especially along Interstate 10 from Willcox to the New Mexico state line. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Motorists should not drive into an area of blowing dust. Remember, Pull Aside, Stay Alive.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cochise County Below 5000 Feet including Douglas, Willcox; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford
